channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- Linux Kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- Linux Kernel

item.title: CVE-2018-8781|2024-08-05T07:02:26.050Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- linux%20kernel
item.description: The udl_fb_mmap function in drivers/gpu/drm/udl/udl_fb.c at the Linux kernel version 3.4 and up to and including 4.15 has an integer-overflow vulnerability allowing local users with access to the udldrmfb driver to obtain full read and write permissions on kernel physical pages, resulting in a code execution in kernel space.
